name: BAMEGOY
description:
Nate is unhappy then suddenly he gets a new BameGoy from his aunt.
His excitement level depends on your performance.

Instructions:

If your internet is slower than expected, please wait a while for the entire program to load before pressing any buttons, this will provide the best experience.

Press the Up Arrow, W or Space to Jump

Press the Down Arrow or S to Charge your jump, let go to fully jump

Press the Left Mouse button to shoot, use your Mouse to aim
